com.engine.resources

Class ResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.resources.ResourceLoader

  • public abstract class ResourceLoader
extends java.lang.Object

    ResourceLoadert

    ResourceLoader is where all of a project's resources are loaded such as graphics, fonts, etc. This class should be extended in a custom class made specifically for your project.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Method Detail

      • loadResources

        public void loadResources()
        Load all of the project's resources. This method calls all of ResourceLoader's sub-methods that load specific project resources.

      • getOS

        public java.lang.String getOS()
        Detect and obtain the operating system in use. Returns as a String.
        Returns:
        OS

      • loadFonts

        public abstract void loadFonts()
        Put every font registration in here. To register a font as a CoreFont, (which must be done to work with the engine) call the registerFont() method in ResourceLoader.

      • registerFont

                                  int fontSize,
                                  boolean isBold)
        Register a font as a CoreFont with the project using the font at a file path as the font to register.
        Parameters:
        fontPath -
        fontName -
        fontSize -
        Returns:
        Font - the java font object to use for setting text fonts

      • checkKey

        public abstract void checkKey(int keyCode,
                              boolean isPressed)
        Checks the project's configured keys to see if any of them were pressed or released based on isPressed. If a Key changed, it updates it accordingly.
        Parameters:
        keyCode -
        isPressed -

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • resizeImage

                                                       int width,
                                                       int height)

        Simple Method

        Scales an image to the given size. Does not use the ImgSclr library.
        Parameters:
        originalImage -
        width -
        height -
        Returns:
        the scaled image as a BufferedImage

      • resizeImageWithHint

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resizeImageWithHint(java.awt.image.BufferedImage originalImage,
                                                               int width,
                                                               int height)

        Good Method

        Scales an image to the given size and sets quality rendering hints. Does not use the ImgSclr library.
        Parameters:
        originalImage -
        width -
        height -
        Returns:
        the scaled image as a BufferedImage

      • generateMask

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage generateMask(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imgSource,
                                                        java.awt.Color color,
                                                        float alpha)
        Generate a mask image based on the given image with the given color and transparency.
        Parameters:
        imgSource - - the original image
        color - - the color of the new mask
        alpha - - the transparency of the new mask
        Returns:
        BufferedImage - the new image mask

      • tint

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage tint(java.awt.image.BufferedImage master,
                                                java.awt.image.BufferedImage tint)
        Create a new image that is a combination of the given master image and the given tint image.
        Parameters:
        master - - the master image
        tint - - the tint image to be drawn over the master image
        Returns:
        BufferedImage - the tinted image
